page.title: 10Caravans and Houses.
page.content: The residential caravan site at Higher Fraddon is called Pedna Carne.Families are housed there by Restormel District Council until there is a council house or flat available.. There is a large council estate called the Carworgie Estate off St.Francis Road.Houses along the main roads are older,having mostly been built before or between the two World Wars.Other more modern private housing has been built together in estates in fields set back from the main roads.These estates are of bungalows,not houses. The Kelliers is land behind the old school on the A30 which was once a beauty spot.For many years caravan dwellers have lived there as squatters and have made the place into a mess. Now(1985) Restormel Council are trying to buy the Kelliers and clear it.
